org.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface PlatformCommandAPI


  • public interface PlatformCommandAPI
    Manipulates a platform command. A command can be registered, unregistered and executed with parameters.
    These commands are executed in a platform scope, see CommandAPI for an explanation of how to deploy, execute, ... a command. The only difference between the CommandAPI and the PlatformCommandAPI is that a platform command must extend org.bonitasoft.engine.command.PlatformCommand.
    Author:
    Matthieu Chaffotte, Emmanuel Duchastenier
    See Also:
    CommandDescriptor

    • Method Detail

      • addDependency

        void addDependency(String name,
                 byte[] jar)
                   throws AlreadyExistsException,
                          CreationException
        Adds a dependency.
        Parameters:
        name - the dependency name.
        jar - the JAR content
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - occurs when the session is not valid
        AlreadyExistsException - occurs when the dependency name is already used for another dependency
        CreationException - if a problem occurs when creating the dependency

      • removeDependency

        void removeDependency(String name)
                      throws DependencyNotFoundException,
                             DeletionException
        Removes the dependency.
        Parameters:
        name - the dependency name.
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the current platform session is not valid
        DependencyNotFoundException - if no dependency can be found with the specified name
        DeletionException - if a problem occurs when deleting the dependency

      • register

        CommandDescriptor register(String name,
                         String description,
                         String implementation)
                           throws AlreadyExistsException,
                                  CreationException
        Adds a command and its descriptor.
        Parameters:
        name - the command name
        description - the command description
        implementation - the implementation class which will be used when executing the command
        Returns:
        the descriptor of the command
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - occurs when the session is not valid
        AlreadyExistsException - occurs when the command name is already used for another command
        CreationException - if a problem occurs when registering the command

      • execute

        Serializable execute(String name,
                   Map<String,Serializable> parameters)
                     throws CommandNotFoundException,
                            CommandParameterizationException,
                            CommandExecutionException
        Executes a command according to its name and the list of parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - the command name
        parameters - the parameters (specific to the command to execute)
        Returns:
        the result of the command execution
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - occurs when the session is not valid
        CommandNotFoundException - occurs when the name does not refer to any existing command
        CommandParameterizationException - when command parameters are not correct
        CommandExecutionException - occurs when an exception is thrown during command execution

      • unregister

        void unregister(String name)
                throws CommandNotFoundException,
                       DeletionException
        Deletes a command and its descriptor.
        Parameters:
        name - the command name
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - occurs when the session is not valid
        CommandNotFoundException - occurs when the name does not refer to an existing command
        DeletionException - occurs when an exception is thrown during command deletion

CommandDescriptor get(String name)
                      throws CommandNotFoundException,
                             CreationException
        Deprecated. As of release 6.2.1, replaced by getCommand(String) that does not throw CreationException.
        Returns the command descriptor.
        Parameters:
        name - the command name
        Returns:
        the descriptor of the command
        Throws:

      • getCommand

        CommandDescriptor getCommand(String commandName)
                             throws CommandNotFoundException
        Returns the command descriptor corresponding to the given command name.
        Parameters:
        commandName - the name of the command
        Returns:
        the descriptor of the command
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - occurs when the session is not valid
        CommandNotFoundException - occurs when the command name does not refer to an existing command.
        Since:
        6.2.1

      • getCommands

        List<CommandDescriptor> getCommands(int startIndex,
                                  int maxResults,
                                  CommandCriterion sort)
        Returns the paginated list of command descriptors according to the sort criterion.
        Parameters:
        startIndex - the start index
        maxResults - the number of CommandDescriptor to retrieve
        sort - the sorting criterion
        Returns:
        the paginated list of command descriptors
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - occurs when the session is not valid

      • update

        void update(String name,
          CommandUpdater updater)
            throws CommandNotFoundException,
                   UpdateException
        Updates a command according to the update descriptor.
        Parameters:
        name - the command name
        updater - the update descriptor
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session is not valid
        CommandNotFoundException - occurs when the name does not refer to any existing command
        UpdateException - occurs when an exception is thrown during command update
